jobs.title: Graduate Test Automation Developer
jobs.description:
This role will be part of a large Managed Service team delivering support and testing for the customer, a UK government department, on their Oracle Cloud HCM and ERP solution.

A pre-requisite for this role is a background in Computer Science with a background in Programming Languages i.e. Java, Java Script, C#, Python or similar.

On joining, the successful candidate will receive structured training on Automation development software and tools on Oracle Cloud Applications to develop talented Oracle functional professionals for our customer. The training will cover various areas including Automation development tools and software, Manual Testing principles and various areas of the HCM and ERP solution including Finance, HR, Payroll and Talent/Recruitment.

This programme will provide a fantastic entry point to the Oracle Cloud market, where the skills that you will learn are highly sought after and valuable.

Main Duties
Develop and maintain the automation framework.
Develop and maintain new and existing test automation scripts.
Build knowledge and become an expert in the business processes that underly the testing scripts.
Supporting Test Lead/Manager in delivering quality services in timely and effective manner as per the business requirements. 
Deliver effective automation solution to increase the overall efficiency of Testing as a service.

Requirements 

Security Clearance IS required for this role (you are not required to have this now, but you should ensure that you are happy to go through security clearance, including but not limited to being a UK citizen with a minimum of 10 years residence in the UK. 
Please familiarise yourself with the eligibility criteria prior to applying, which can be found by searching for Gov.uk vetting eligibility criteria.
Please search Gov.uk for the vetting charter which helps understanding of what is expected during the clearance process. 
Please note that this role is a fully on-site position in Manchester, London and NOT a Hybrid/Home-Working role.
Degree qualified (or equivalent experience) – A Computer Science or equivalent Degree is required for this role, and specifically this must include a background in Programming Languages i.e. Java, Java Script, C#, Python or similar.
Honest with bags of integrity; you will have the ability to make mistakes and hold yourself accountable, challenge negative behaviours and tell the truth even when it’s not popular.
Be passionate about technology and process and have a desire to understand how both can improve business function and efficiency. 
A motivated self-starter; we will support you, but you will need to be accountable, keen to learn and pro-active in always finding things to do and learn. 
Conscientious with a keen attention to detail and truly customer focused. It’s really important that you are someone who can focus on detail and be proud of what you deliver to ensure our customers are delighted with our work. 
Able to ask questions when something isn’t clear – no question is too silly, and there are a lot of acronyms used in business! Excellence means a focus on the desired outcome for our customers by clarifying what they really mean and need. 
Able to Challenge; as a collaborative team, we have open discussions and always encourage a different perspective.
